name: Tagoar

skills.name: Da Magic Stick
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff for 2 turns on the ally with the lowest current HP.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Damage +5%
Damage Multiplier: 1.8 ATK

effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.name: Charge Cant (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then heals all allies by 15% of this Champion’s MAX HP.
Level 2: Heal +10%
Level 3: Heal +10%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
Level 5: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 3.7 ATK

skills.name: Rise and Fight (Cooldown: 7 turns)
skills.description:
Revives all dead allies with 30% HP. Also places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 20% of this Champion’s MAX HP.
Level 2: Cooldown -1
Level 3: Cooldown -1

forms.aura: Increases Ally HP in all battles by 25%
forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

stat_priorities: HP% (primary scaling for heal 25% MAX HP + shield 20% MAX HP)
RES 200-300+ (resist debuffs, stay alive to revive)
ACC NOT needed (no debuffs in kit)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: HP% 60k-80k+ (heal 15k-20k), SPD 200-220 (2:1 speed tune viable), DEF% 2500+, RES 200+ (resist CB debuffs). A2 Increase SPD 30% (3-turn CD booked) excellent speed manipulation. Warmaster synergy (A2 AOE damage for procs). Community: 'Better than Scyl for CB sustain'.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: HP% 60k+, SPD 220+, DEF% 2500+, RES 200+. A2 AOE heal + Increase SPD for wave clear sustain. A3 revive safety net. Passive 10% damage reduction for allies <50% HP. Good for mid-game dungeon carry, outperformed late-game by specialists.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: HP% 70k+ (Hard floors survivability), SPD 220+, DEF% 3000+, RES 300+ (resist Hard debuffs). A3 full revive critical for Hard boss recovery. Passive 10% damage reduction synergy with revive (prevents immediate re-death). Community: 'Carried Doom Tower early account'.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: HP% 60k-80k+ (massive shield 12k-16k, heal 15k-20k), SPD 200-220+, DEF% 2500+, RES 200+. A3 full revive arena defense cheese (community: 'Last man standing revives EVERYONE'). Aura +25% HP all battles (8★ utility). Issue: Weak offense (low damage), situational defense pick.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 10/10 RATING - FACTION WARS MVP. HP% 60k-80k+, SPD 220+, DEF% 2500+, RES 200+. Community: 'Best healer/reviver Orcs below Legendaries', 'Carried FW21 Orcs 3-star completion', 'Dynamic duo Tagoar + Artak'. A3 full revive + shield = infinite sustain. Aura +25% HP critical for squishy Orcs DPS (Robar, Galek). MUST BUILD for Orcs FW.

recommended_gear: Regeneration + Immortal (PRIMARY - PVE sustain): Regeneration 15% HP heal per turn + Immortal passive regen = infinite sustain. Community tested: 'Full Immortal also works', 'Regen + Immortal best results'. HP% gloves/chest/boots (or SPD boots).
3x Speed (Arena/Faction Wars): Fast healer/reviver. Community: '3 Speed sets work just fine'. SPD boots mandatory, HP% gloves/chest for shield/heal scaling. Alternative: 2x Speed + HP% set.
Bolster + Immortal (Arena defense): Bolster shield synergy (A3 shield 20% MAX HP), Immortal sustain. Community tested: 'Bolster + Immortal great job'. Tank build for last-man-standing revive cheese.
Guardian + Regeneration (Team support): Guardian boost ally DEF (synergy with A1 Increase DEF), Regeneration sustain. Good for Clan Boss/Hydra team support role.
Stoneskin + Immortal (Late-game arena): Stoneskin block one-shot potential, Immortal sustain. Pair with +25% HP Aura for extreme tankiness. Alternative: Protection set.

clan_boss: Offense tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Single Out, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Wrath of the Slain, Methodical, Warmaster (T6)
Support tree: Steadfast, Lay on Hands, Shield Bearer, Healing Savior, Merciful Aid, Lasting Gifts, Spirit Haste
Focus: Warmaster for CB damage (A2 AOE for procs), Healing Savior boost heal 10%, Lasting Gifts extend buffs (Increase SPD/DEF/Shield)
dungeons: Same as Clan Boss build (Warmaster + Healing Savior + Lasting Gifts)
Alternative Support tree: Steadfast, Lay on Hands, Healing Savior, Rapid Response, Merciful Aid, Lore of Steel, Lasting Gifts, Spirit Haste (pure support, no Warmaster)
arena: Defense tree: Defiant, Rejuvenation, Improved Parry, Shadow Heal, Delay Death, Cycle of Revenge (survivability focus)
Support tree: Steadfast, Lay on Hands, Healing Savior, Rapid Response, Merciful Aid, Lore of Steel, Lasting Gifts, Spirit Haste, Timely Intervention (T6 reviver)
Focus: Timely Intervention T6 (revive cooldown reduction), Delay Death (survive burst to revive), Lasting Gifts (extend Shield duration)
doom_tower: Same as Arena build (Timely Intervention + Delay Death + Lasting Gifts)
Revive cooldown reduction critical for Hard boss recovery
Delay Death synergy with Passive (10% damage reduction <50% HP = survive to revive)
faction_wars: Same as Arena build (Timely Intervention + Delay Death + Lasting Gifts)
Community: 'Fully mastery him, worth it', 'Carried FW21 Orcs 3-star'
Revive cooldown reduction + Shield/buff extension = infinite sustain FW waves
general: Warmaster PVE (CB/Dungeons), Timely Intervention PVP/FW (revive focus)

blessings: Commanding Presence (Aura lead role): Extend Aura +25% HP duration/effect. Good for team support builds.
Phantom Touch (Damage dealer role secondary): Boost A2 AOE damage for Warmaster procs. Not primary use case (support role focus).
Miracle Heal (Support PRIMARY): Community recommended. Quick cycling healer, boost heal frequency. Good for Faction Wars + early account sustain.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI uses A3 for Shield even when no dead allies. Community: 'Wish AI wasn't so stupid, uses A3 shield no deaths'. Not game-breaking (shield still useful), but wastes revive cooldown. Manual control recommended for critical content (Faction Wars boss, Doom Tower Hard bosses, Arena).

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Last-man-standing full revive, Arena defense infinite sustain
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: ARENA DEFENSE CHEESE: Build extreme tankiness (Regen + Immortal, +25% HP Aura, high DEF/RES). Survive as last man → A3 full revive all allies 30% HP + Shield 20% MAX HP → Passive 10% damage reduction <50% HP → A2 heal 25% MAX HP → repeat. Community: 'Last man standing revives EVERYONE', 'Sorry boss but we win', 'Ideal arena defense trait'. FACTION WARS CHEESE: 'Dynamic duo Tagoar + Artak' infinite revive loop. Tagoar revives Artak → Artak nukes waves → Tagoar heals/shields → repeat until FW21 3-star complete. Community tested: 'Finished FW21 Orcs with Tagoar reviving 3 disposable 5-star attackers over and over'. Passive 10% damage reduction synergy prevents immediate re-death after revive. CHIMERA CHEESE: Community: 'BEAST in Chimera'. A2 Increase SPD 30% (3-turn CD) for speed tuning, A3 full revive recovery from head snipes, Passive damage reduction for sustained fights.

mechanics_advisory: EPIC VERSION OF DUCHESS - Community consensus: 'A/S-tier Epic minimum'. Upgraded B→A rank April 2023 after community feedback. HellHades: 'Top tier Epic champion', 'Worth considering for Teleria's top tier Epics'. Community comparison to Duchess Lilitu (Legendary): Similar kit (revive all + sustain + damage reduction), worse individual abilities (30% vs 50% revive HP, 20% shield vs Veil, 10% damage reduction vs 25% AOE reduction, Increase DEF vs Perfect Veil), but EPIC rarity = easier to obtain/book (10 tomes vs Legendary). Community debate: 'Tagoar S+++ tier', 'Epic Arbiter type', 'Better than Uugo?' (controversial). SKILL ANALYSIS: A1 Da Magic Stick (2-hit 1.8 ATK, Increase DEF 60% lowest HP 2 turns) - SUPPORT UTILITY. Low damage but buff critical for squishy champions (Robar, Galek Orcs). A2 Charge Cant (AOE 3.7 ATK, Increase SPD 30% all 2 turns, heal 25% MAX HP all, CD 5→3 booked) - CORE SUSTAIN. Scales with Tagoar HP (60k = 15k heal, 80k = 20k heal). Warmaster synergy AOE damage. Speed manipulation for 2:1 CB tuning. MUST BOOK cooldown 5→3 (100% uptime speed). A3 Rise and Fight (revive all 30% HP, shield all 20% MAX HP 2 turns, CD 7→5 booked) - GAME-CHANGING RECOVERY. Full team revive (not conditional like Uugo/Rector Drath), usable anytime (AI wastes on shield spam). Shield prevents immediate re-death (60k HP = 12k shield, 80k HP = 16k shield). MUST BOOK cooldown 7→5. Passive Aid the Feeble (reduce damage 10% allies <50% HP) - DUCHESS-LITE. Synergy with A3 revive (revived allies 30% HP = <50% threshold = 10% reduction). AURA: +25% HP all battles = 8★ UTILITY. Community: '+25% HP Aura enabled Artak stay alive FW21'. Critical for squishy Orcs (low base HP faction). COMMUNITY QUOTES: 'Essentially Epic Duchess', 'One tough cookie', 'Carried Doom Tower/Nightmare Campaign/FW21 early account', 'Epic Arbiter type', 'Better than Scyl for CB sustain', 'S tier Epic minimum'. TAGOAR VS UUGO DEBATE: Community split. Pro-Tagoar: 'Full revive usable anytime', 'Easier to build (no ACC needed)', 'Faster base SPD 105 vs Uugo 102', '10 tomes vs Uugo 16 tomes', 'Better FW carry', 'Tanky + heal sustain'. Pro-Uugo: 'Decrease DEF + Block Buffs + Cleanse = debuffer utility', 'Better CB/Arena debuffer', 'Leech synergy'. Consensus: Different roles (Tagoar sustain/revive, Uugo debuffer/control). Both S-tier Epics. BUILD PRIORITY: HP% 60k-80k+ mandatory (heal/shield scaling). SPD 200-220+ (turn cycling). DEF%/RES survivability (tank support). NO ACC needed (no debuffs). Regen + Immortal or 3x Speed sets. MUST BOOK A2+A3 cooldowns (10 tomes total). MUST mastery (Timely Intervention T6 for revive cooldown or Warmaster T6 for CB damage). USE CASE: Faction Wars MVP (10/10 rating), early account blessing (Campaign/Doom Tower carry), Chimera beast, CB 2:1 speed tune support, Arena defense cheese (last-man revive). PATCH HISTORY: Patch 6.22 Nov 2022 updates (unknown buffs). VERDICT: TOP TIER EPIC SUPPORT. Build immediately if pulled early/mid game. Faction Wars carry. Pair with DPS champions (Tagoar sustain, DPS kill). Community: 'Give him masteries, worth it', 'Fully book him'.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats validated from Champion_stats.md table (HP 18165, ATK 1145, DEF 947, SPD 105, C.RATE 18%, C.DMG 50%, RES 18%). 100% confidence. Ayumilove A-rank (upgraded from B April 2023). HellHades TOP TIER EPIC. Community: 'Epic Duchess', 'S+++ tier', 'Faction Wars MVP'.

HellHades Tagoar Ratings: https://hellhades.com/champions/tagoar/ (accessed 2025-10-28, TOP TIER EPIC, Epic Duchess comparison)
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Epic Support Magic Orcs - EPIC VERSION OF DUCHESS. A-rank (upgraded B→A April 2023 community feedback). 10/10 FACTION WARS MVP. Full team revive + heal + shield + Increase SPD + Passive damage reduction = complete sustain kit. Aura +25% HP all battles (8★ utility). Community: 'S+++ tier', 'Top 5 Epic support', 'Carried FW21 Orcs 3-star', 'BEAST in Chimera', 'Early account blessing'. AI issue: wastes A3 shield when no deaths (manual control recommended). Cheese: Last-man-standing arena defense revive, Faction Wars infinite sustain (Tagoar+Artak duo). Build: HP% 60k-80k+ (heal/shield scaling), SPD 220+, DEF%/RES. NO ACC needed. Regen+Immortal or 3x Speed. MUST BOOK A2+A3 (10 tomes). Community debate vs Uugo (different roles, both S-tier). Completed using Strategy 1 workflow (skills effects template placeholders, comprehensive sections 100% populated).

update_notes.last_patch: Patch 6.22 (Nov 2022): Updates (unknown buffs). Historical: Upgraded B-rank → A-rank April 2023 after community feedback (Money Moto, Ken, Sepidaceous). Community consensus: 'Epic Duchess', 'S+++ tier minimum', 'A/S-tier Epic'. Tagoar vs Uugo debate (Pro-Tagoar: full revive anytime, easier build, better FW; Pro-Uugo: debuffer utility, better CB/Arena). Both S-tier Epics different roles.
